alert.name: AddFriendWithMessage
alert.title: Add Friend
alert.message:
Friends can give permissions to track each other on the map and receive online status updates.
Offer friendship to [NAME]?

alert.name: RemoveFromFriends
alert.message: Do you want to remove [FIRST_NAME] [LAST_NAME] from your Friends List?

alert.name: RemoveMultipleFromFriends
alert.message: Do you want to remove multiple friends from your Friends list?

alert.name: GodDeleteAllScriptedPublicObjectsByUser
alert.message: Are you sure you want to delete all scripted objects owned by ** [AVATAR_NAME] ** on all others land in this sim?

alert.name: GodDeleteAllScriptedObjectsByUser
alert.message: Are you sure you want to DELETE ALL scripted objects owned by ** [AVATAR_NAME] ** on ALL LAND in this sim?

alert.name: GodDeleteAllObjectsByUser
alert.message: Are you sure you want to DELETE ALL objects (scripted or not) owned by ** [AVATAR_NAME] ** on ALL LAND in this sim?

alert.name: PublishGroupInfoToWeb
alert.message: Selecting the "Publish on the Web" option allows us to publish the group name, insignia, charter, titles, and founder on the [SECOND_LIFE] website. You are responsible for indicating if any of the above content is considered Mature according to the Community Standards.

alert.name: BlankClassifiedName
alert.message: You must specify a name for your classified.

alert.name: MinClassifiedPrice
alert.message:
Price to pay for listing must be at least L$[MIN_PRICE].
Please enter a higher price.

alert.name: CantLoadVertexShaders
alert.message: Unable to load Vertex Shaders.

alert.name: ConfirmObjectDeleteLock
alert.message:
At least one of the items you have selected is locked.
Are you sure you want to delete these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectDeleteNoCopy
alert.message:
At least one of the items you have selected is not copyable.
Are you sure you want to delete these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectDeleteNoOwn
alert.message:
You do not own least one of the items you have selected .
Are you sure you want to delete these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectDeleteLockNoCopy
alert.message:
At least one object is locked. At least one object is not copyable.
Are you sure you want to delete these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectDeleteLockNoOwn
alert.message:
At least one object is locked. You do not own least one object.
Are you sure you want to delete these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectDeleteNoCopyNoOwn
alert.message:
At least one object is not copyable. You do not own least one object.
Are you sure you want to delete these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectDeleteLockNoCopyNoOwn
alert.message:
At least one object is locked. At least one object is not copyable. You do not own least one object.
Are you sure you want to delete these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectTakeLock
alert.message:
At least one object is locked.
Are you sure you want to take these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectTakeNoOwn
alert.message:
You do not own all of the objects you are taking. If you continue, next owner permissions will be applied and possibly restrict your ability to modify or copy them.
Are you sure you want to take these items?

alert.name: ConfirmObjectTakeLockNoOwn
alert.message:
At least one object is locked. You do not own all of the objects you are taking. If you continue, next owner permissions will be applied and possibly restrict your ability to modify or copy them. However, you can take the current selection.
Are you sure you want to take these items?

alert.name: CantBuyLandAcrossMultipleRegions
alert.message:
Unable to buy land because selection spans multiple regions.
Please select a smaller area and try again.

alert.name: DeedLandToGroup
alert.message:
By deeding this parcel, the group will be required to have and maintain sufficient land use credits. The purchase price of the land is not refunded to the owner. If a deeded parcel is sold, the sale price will be divided evenly among group members.
Deed this [AREA] m2 of land to the group '[GROUP_NAME]'?

alert.name: DeedLandToGroupWithContribution
alert.message:
By deeding this parcel, the group will be required to have and maintain sufficient land use credits. The deed will include a simultaneous land contribution to the group from '[FIRST_NAME] [LAST_NAME]'. The purchase price of the land is not refunded to the owner. If a deeded parcel is sold, the sale price will be divided evenly among group members.
Deed this [AREA] m2 of land to the group '[GROUP_NAME]'?

alert.name: DisplaySetToSafe
alert.message: Display settings have been set to safe levels because you have specified the -safe option.

alert.name: DisplaySetToRecommended
alert.message: Display settings have been set to recommended levels based on your system configuration.

alert.name: UnableToConnect
alert.message: Unable to connect to server. Could not request domain name: [HOST_NAME]

alert.name: CanNotFindServer
alert.message:
Unable to find the server domain name. This could be the result of a lost network connection or a server problem.
Please try again in a few minutes, or click Help for advice and a link to the system status web page.

alert.name: PleaseSelectServer
alert.message: Please select a server. Unable to connect to [IP_ADDRESS]

alert.name: SystemMayBeDown
alert.message:
Unable to connect to [SECOND_LIFE] The system may be down.
Please try again in a few minutes, or click Help for advice and a link to the system status web page.

alert.name: ErrorMessage
alert.message: [ERROR_MESSAGE]

alert.name: QuickTimeOutOfDate
alert.ignore: When QuickTime is disabled because it is out of date
alert.message:
Streaming video has been disabled because the version of QuickTime installed on your system is out of date.
Visit http://www.apple.com/quicktime/ and download an update.

alert.name: AvatarMoved
alert.message: Your [TYPE] location is not currently available. [HELP] You have been moved into a nearby region.

alert.name: ClothingLoading
alert.message: Your clothing is still downloading. You can use [SECOND_LIFE] normally and other users will see you correctly.
alert.ignore: When clothing is taking a long time to download

alert.name: FirstRun
alert.message:
[VIEWER] installation is complete.
If this is your first time using [SECOND_LIFE], you will need to create an account before you can log on. Return to www.secondlife.com to create a new account?

alert.name: SetByHostFail
alert.message:
Unable to connect to server. Could not resolve domain name: [HOST_NAME]
Please check your network connection.

alert.name: LoginPacketNeverReceived
alert.message:
We're having trouble connecting. There may be a problem with your internet connection or the [SECOND_LIFE] servers.
You can either check your internet connection and try again in a few minutes, click Help to connect to our support site, or click Teleport to attempt to teleport home.

alert.name: WelcomeNoClothes
alert.message:
Your character will appear in a moment.
Use arrow keys to walk. Press the F1 key at any time for help or to learn more about [SECOND_LIFE].

alert.name: WelcomeChooseSex
alert.message:
Your character will appear in a moment.
Use arrow keys to walk. Press the F1 key at any time for help or to learn more about [SECOND_LIFE]. Please choose the male or female avatar. You can change your mind later.

alert.name: NotEnoughCurrency
alert.message: [NAME] L$ [PRICE] You don't have enough L$ to do that.

alert.name: GrantedModifyRights
alert.message: You have been granted the privilege to modify [FIRST_NAME] [LAST_NAME]'s objects.

alert.name: RevokedModifyRights
alert.message: Your privilege to modify [FIRST_NAME] [LAST_NAME]'s objects has been revoked

alert.name: FlushMapVisibilityCaches
alert.message: This will flush the map caches on this region. This is really only useful for debugging. (In production, wait 5 minutes, then everyone's map will update after they relog.)

alert.name: OnlyCopyContentsOfSingleItem
alert.message: Unable to copy the contents of more than one item at a time. Please select only one object and try again.

alert.name: KickUsersFromRegion
alert.message: Teleport all Residents in this region home?

alert.name: EstateObjectReturn
alert.message: Are you sure you want to return objects owned by [USER_NAME] ?

alert.name: InvalidTerrainBitDepth
alert.message:
Couldn't set region textures: Terrain texture [TEXTURE_NUM] has an invalid bit depth of [TEXTURE_BIT_DEPTH].
Replace texture [TEXTURE_NUM] with a 24-bit 512x512 or smaller image then click "Apply" again.

alert.name: InvalidTerrainSize
alert.message:
Couldn't set region textures: Terrain texture [TEXTURE_NUM] is too large at [TEXTURE_SIZE_X]x[TEXTURE_SIZE_Y].
Replace texture [TEXTURE_NUM] with a 24-bit 512x512 or smaller image then click "Apply" again.

alert.name: RawUploadStarted
alert.message: Upload started. It may take up to two minutes, depending on your connection speed.

alert.name: ConfirmBakeTerrain
alert.message: Do you really want to bake the current terrain, make it the center for terrain raise/lower limits and the default for the 'Revert' tool?

alert.name: MaxAllowedAgentOnRegion

alert.name: MaxBannedAgentsOnRegion

alert.name: MaxAgentOnRegionBatch
alert.message: Failure while attempting to add [NUM_ADDED] agents: Exceeds the [MAX_AGENTS] [LIST_TYPE] limit by [NUM_EXCESS].

alert.name: MaxAllowedGroupsOnRegion

alert.name: MaxManagersOnRegion

alert.name: OwnerCanNotBeDenied

alert.name: CanNotChangeAppearanceUntilLoaded
alert.message: Can't change appearance until clothing and shape are loaded.

alert.name: ClassifiedMustBeAlphanumeric
alert.message: The name of your classified must start with a letter from A to Z or a number. No punctuation is allowed.

alert.name: CantSetBuyObject
alert.message: Can't set Buy Object, because the object is not for sale. Please set the object for sale and try again.

alert.name: FinishedRawDownload
alert.message: Finished download of raw terrain file to: [DOWNLOAD_PATH].

alert.name: DownloadWindowsMandatory

alert.name: DownloadWindows

alert.name: DownloadWindowsReleaseForDownload
alert.message: An updated version of [VIEWER] is available. [MESSAGE] This update is not required, but we suggest you install it to improve performance and stability.

Download to your Applications folder?

alert.name: ReturnToOwner
alert.message:
Are you sure you want to return the selected objects to their owners? Transferable deeded objects will be returned to their previous owners.
*WARNING* No-transfer deeded objects will be deleted!
alert.ignore: When returning objects to their owners

alert.message: You are currently an officer of the group [GROUP]. Leave Group?

alert.name: ConfirmKick
alert.message: Do you REALLY want to kick all users off the grid?

alert.message: Sorry, you cannot mute a Linden.

alert.message: You already have muted this name.

alert.name: CantOfferCallingCard

alert.name: CantOfferFriendship

alert.name: CantSetHome

alert.name: BusyModeSet
alert.message: Busy mode set. Chat and instant messages will be hidden. Instant messages will get your Busy mode response. All teleportation offers will be declined. All inventory offers will go to your Trash.

alert.name: NoPVPDetected
alert.message: No player vs. player (PvP) abuse detected

alert.name: NotecardAttachPermFail
alert.message: Only items with unrestricted 'next owner' permissions can be attached to notecards.

alert.name: JoinedTooManyGroupsMember
alert.message: You are a member of too many groups to join another one. Please leave at least one group before joining this one, or decline the offer. To leave a group select the 'Groups..' option from the 'Edit' menu. [NAME] has invited you to join a group as a member. [INVITE]

alert.name: JoinedTooManyGroupsOfficer
alert.message: You are a member of too many groups to join another one. Please leave at least one group before joining this one, or decline the offer. To leave a group select the 'Groups..' option from the 'Edit' menu. [NAME] has invited you to join a group as an officer. [INVITE]

alert.name: KickUser
alert.message: Kick this user with what message?
alert.editline: An administrator has logged you off.

alert.name: KickAllUsers
alert.message: Kick everyone currently on the grid with what message?
alert.editline: An administrator has logged you off.

alert.name: FreezeUser
alert.message: Freeze this user with what message?
alert.editline: You have been frozen. You cannot move or chat. An administrator will contact you via instant message (IM).

alert.name: UnFreezeUser
alert.message: Unfreeze this user with what message?

alert.message: Enter the agent id of a user to expunge

alert.name: OfferTeleport
alert.message: Offer a teleport to your location with the following message?

alert.message: God summon user to your location?

alert.message: Are you sure you want to teleport?

alert.name: MessageEstate
alert.title: Message everyone in your Estate
alert.message: Type a short announcement which will be sent to everyone currently in your estate.

alert.name: ChangeLindenEstate
alert.title: Change Linden Estate
alert.message:
You are about to change a Linden owned estate (mainland, teen grid, orientation, etc.).
This is EXTREMELY DANGEROUS because it can fundamentally affect the user experience. On the mainland, it will change thousands of regions and make the spaceserver hiccup.
Proceed?

alert.name: ChangeLindenAccess
alert.title: Change Linden Estate Access
alert.message:
You are about to change the access list for a Linden owned estate (mainland, teen grid, orientation, etc.).
This is DANGEROUS and should only be done to invoke the hack allowing objects/L$ to be transfered in/out of a grid. It will change thousands of regions and make the spaceserver hiccup.

alert.title: Select estate

alert.name: EstateAllowedAgentRemove

alert.message: Add to group allowed list for this estate only or for [ALL_ESTATES]?

alert.title: Select estate
alert.message: Deny access for this estate only or for [ALL_ESTATES]?

alert.name: EstateBannedAgentRemove
alert.title: Select estate
alert.message: Remove this Resident from the ban list for access for this estate only or for [ALL_ESTATES]?

alert.name: EstateManagerAdd
alert.title: Select estate
alert.message: Add estate manager for this estate only or for [ALL_ESTATES]?

alert.name: EstateManagerRemove
alert.title: Select estate
alert.message: Remove estate manager for this estate only or for [ALL_ESTATES]?

alert.name: EstateCovenantChange
alert.title: Select estate
alert.message: Change Covenant Message for this estate only or for [ALL_ESTATES]?

alert.name: EstateKickUser
alert.title: Confirm Kick
alert.message: Kick [EVIL_USER] from this estate?

alert.name: EstateChangeCovenant
alert.message: Are you sure you want to change the Estate Covenant?

alert.name: ProblemImportingEstateCovenant
alert.message: Problem importing estate covenant.

alert.name: ProblemAddingEstateManager
alert.message: Problems adding a new estate manager. One or more estates may have a full manager list.

alert.name: ProblemAddingEstateGeneric
alert.message: Problems adding to this estate list. One or more estates may have a full list.

alert.name: UnableToLoadNotecard
alert.message: Unable to load notecard's asset at this time.

alert.name: NotAllowedToViewNotecard
alert.message: Insufficient permissions to view notecard associated with asset ID requested.

alert.name: MissingNotecardAssetID
alert.message: Asset ID for notecard is missing from database.

alert.name: PublishClassified
alert.message:
Remember: Classified ad fees are non-refundable.
Publish this classified now for L$[AMOUNT]?

alert.name: SetClassifiedMature
alert.message: Does this classified contain Mature content?

alert.name: SetGroupMature
alert.message: Does this group contain Mature content?

alert.name: ConfirmRestart
alert.title: Confirm restart
alert.message: Do you really want to restart this region in 2 minutes?

alert.name: MessageRegion
alert.title: Message everyone in this region
alert.message: Type a short announcement which will be sent to everyone in this region.

alert.name: HelpRegionBlockTerraform
alert.title: Block Terraform
alert.message:
If this box is checked, land owners will not be able to terraform their land regardless of the per-parcel 'Edit Terrain' setting.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpRegionBlockFly
alert.title: Block Fly
alert.message:
If this box is checked, people will not be able to fly in this region regardless of the per-parcel 'Fly' setting.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpRegionAllowDamage
alert.title: Allow Damage
alert.message:
If this box is checked, the health system across all parcels regardless of individual parcel settings. If this box is left unchecked, individual parcel owners will still be able to activate the health system on their parcels.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpRegionAgentLimit
alert.title: Agent Limit
alert.message:
Sets the maximum number of avatars allowed in this region. Performance may vary depending on the number avatars present.
Default: 40

alert.name: HelpRegionObjectBonus
alert.title: Object Bonus
alert.message:
The Object Bonus is a multiplier for primitives allowed on any given parcel. The range allowed is 1 to 10. Set at '1', each 512m2 parcel is allowed 117 objects. Set at '2', each 512m2 parcel is allowed 234, or twice as many, and so on. The max number of objects allowed per region remains 15,000 no matter what the Object Bonus is. Once set, be aware that lowering the Object Bonus may cause objects to be returned or deleted.
Default: 1.0

alert.name: HelpRegionMaturity
alert.title: Maturity
alert.message:
Sets the maturity of the region, as shown at the top of the screen and in pop-up tips on the map. This setting also affects search results - Residents can choose not to find content in Mature regions.
It may take some time for this change to be reflected on the map.
Default: PG

alert.name: HelpRegionRestrictPushObject
alert.title: Restrict Pushing
alert.message:
This checkbox sets the full region to restricted push permissions. When enabled, Residents may only be pushed by themselves or by the parcel's owner. (Push refers to the llPushObject() LSL function.)
Default: Off

alert.name: HelpParcelChanges
alert.title: Parcel Join/Subdivide
alert.message:
This checkbox sets whether or not parcels not owned by the estate owner can be joined or subdivided. If this option is unchecked: * Only estate owners or managers can join or subdivide parcels. * They may only join or subdivide parcels belonging to the owner, or to a group where they have the appropriate group powers. If this option is checked: * All parcel owners can join or subdivide the parcels they own. * For group owned parcels, those with appropriate group powers may join or subdivide parcels.
Default: Checked

alert.name: HelpRegionSearch
alert.title: Do Not Show In Search
alert.message: Checking this box will block parcel owners from listing their parcels in search Default: Off

alert.name: HelpParcelSearch
alert.title: Do Not Show In Search
alert.message: Checking this box will show: - this parcel in search results - this parcel's public objects

alert.name: RegionMaturityChange
alert.title: Changed Region Maturity
alert.message: The maturity rating for this region has been updated. It may take some time for the change to be reflected on the map.

alert.name: HelpRegionLandResell
alert.title: Land Resale
alert.message:
Estate owners and managers can sell any land owned by the estate owner. If this option is left unchecked, buyers cannot resell their land in this region. If this option is checked, buyers can resell their land in this region.
Default: Disallow

alert.name: HelpEstateCovenantID
alert.title: Covenant Asset ID
alert.message:
Sets the notecard asset ID for the Estate Covenant belonging to this estate.
Default: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 or none

alert.name: HelpRegionDisableScripts
alert.title: Disable Scripts
alert.message:
When sim performance is poor, a script may be to blame. Open the Statistics Bar (Ctrl-Shift-1). Look at the Simulator Physics FPS. If it is lower than 45, open the Time panel located at the bottom of the Stats Bar. If Script Time reads 25 ms or higher, click the Get Top Scripts button. You will be given the name and location of scripts that may be causing poor performance.
Checking the Disable Scripts box and then pressing the Apply button will temporarily disable all scripts in this region. You may need to do this in order to travel to the location of a noted 'top script'. Once you have arrived at the location, investigate the script to determine if it is causing the problem. You may want to contact the owner of the script or delete or return the object. Uncheck the Disable Script box and then Apply to reactivate the scripts in the region.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpRegionDisableCollisions
alert.title: Disable Collisions
alert.message:
When sim performance is poor, physical objects may be to blame. Open the Statistics Bar (Ctrl-Shift-1). Look at the Simulator Physics FPS. If it is lower than 45, open the Time panel located at the bottom of the Stats Bar. If Sim Time (Physics) reads 20 ms or higher, click the Get Top Colliders button. You will be given the name and location of physical objects that may be causing poor performance.
Checking the Disable Collisions box and then pressing the Apply button will temporarily disable object-object collisions. You may need to do this in order to travel to the location of a noted 'top collider'. Once you have arrived at the location, investigate the object - is it constantly colliding with other objects? You may want to contact the owner of the object or delete or return the object. Uncheck the Disable Collisions box and then Apply to reactivate collisions in the region.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpRegionDisablePhysics
alert.title: Disable Physics
alert.message:
Disable Physics is similar to Disable Collisions, except all physics simulation is disabled. This means that not only will objects stop colliding, but avatars will be unable to move.
This should only be used when Disable Collisions does not give back enough performance to the region to investigate a physics problem or Top Collider.
Be sure to re-enable physics when you are done, or avatars will continue to be unable to move.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpRegionTopColliders
alert.title: Top Colliders
alert.message: Show a list of objects experiencing the greatest number of potential object-object collisions. These objects can slow performance. Select View > Statistics Bar and look under Simulator > Time > Sim Time (Physics) to see if more than 20 ms is being spent in physics.

alert.name: HelpRegionTopScripts
alert.title: Top Scripts
alert.message: Show a list of objects spending the most time running LSL scripts. These objects can slow performance. Select View > Statistics Bar and look under Simulator > Time > Script Time to see if more than 25 ms is being spent in scripts.

alert.name: HelpRegionRestart
alert.title: Restart Region
alert.message:
Restart the server process running this region after a two minute warning. All Residents in the region will be disconnected. The region will save its data, and should come back up within 90 seconds.
Restarting the region will not fix most performance problems, and should usually be used only when directed.

alert.name: HelpRegionWaterHeight
alert.title: Water Height
alert.message:
This is the height in meters where water appears. If this setting is anything other than 20 and you have water that is adjacent to the edge of world or 'void' water, there will be a visible gap.
Default: 20

alert.name: HelpRegionTerrainRaise
alert.title: Terrain Raise
alert.message:
This is the distance in meters that parcel owners can raise their terrain above the 'baked' terrain default height.
Default: 4

alert.name: HelpRegionTerrainLower
alert.title: Terrain Lower
alert.message:
This is the distance in meters that parcel owners can lower their terrain below the 'baked' terrain default height.
Default: -4

alert.name: HelpRegionUploadRaw
alert.title: Upload RAW Terrain
alert.message:
This button uploads a .RAW file to the region you are in. The file must have the correct dimensions (RGB, 256x256) and 13 channels. The best way to create a terrain file is to download the existing RAW file. A good first step is to modify the red channel (land height), and upload it.
The upload can take up to 45 seconds. Note that uploading a terrain file *will not* move the objects that are on the land, only the terrain itself and the permissions associated with the parcels. This can result in objects going underground.
For more information on editing region height fields, consult F1 Help.

alert.name: HelpRegionDownloadRaw
alert.title: Download RAW Terrain
alert.message:
This button downloads a file containing the height field data, parcel dimensions, parcel for sale status and some parcel permissions for this region. When opening the file in a program such as Photoshop you must specify the document's dimensions which are: RGB, 256x256 with 13 channels. This terrain file cannot be opened in any other way.
For more information on editing region height fields, consult F1 help.

alert.name: HelpRegionUseEstateSun
alert.title: Use Estate Sun
alert.message:
This checkbox makes the sun position in this region the same as the sun position in the rest of the estate.
Default: on

alert.name: HelpRegionFixedSun
alert.title: Fixed Sun
alert.message:
This checkbox sets the sun position to the position in the Phase slider and stops the sun from moving.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpRegionBakeTerrain
alert.title: Bake Terrain
alert.message: This button saves the current shape of the terrain as the new default for the region. Once baked, the land can revert to the saved shape whenever you or others use the Edit Terrain 'Revert' option. The baked terrain is also the middle point for the terrain raise and lower limits.

alert.name: HelpEstateEstateManager
alert.title: Estate Managers
alert.message:
An estate manager is a Resident to whom you have delegated control of region and estate settings. An estate manager can change any setting in these panels, except for uploading, downloading, and baking terrain. In particular, they can allow or ban Residents from your estate.
Estate managers can only be added or removed by the owner of the estate, not by each other. Please only choose Residents you trust as estate managers, as you will be ultimately responsible for their actions.

alert.name: HelpEstateUseGlobalTime
alert.title: Use Global Time
alert.message:
This checkbox makes the sun in your estate follow the same position as on the Linden-owned 'mainland' estates.
Default: on

alert.name: HelpEstateFixedSun
alert.title: Fixed Sun
alert.message: This checkbox sets the sun position to the position in the Phase slider and stops the sun from moving.

alert.name: HelpEstateExternallyVisible
alert.title: Public Access
alert.message:
This checkbox sets whether Residents who are on other estates can enter this estate without being on an access list.
Default: on

alert.name: HelpEstateAllowDirectTeleport
alert.title: Allow Direct Teleport
alert.message:
When checked, allows Residents to directly teleport to any point in your estate. When unchecked, Residents teleport to the nearest telehub.
Default: off

alert.name: HelpEstateAllowResident
alert.title: Allow Access
alert.message: Access to this estate will be limited to Residents listed here and any groups below. This setting is only available when Public Access is unchecked.

alert.name: HelpEstateAllowGroup
alert.title: Allow Group Access
alert.message: Access to this estate will be limited to groups listed here and any Residents above. This setting is only available when Public Access is unchecked.

alert.name: HelpEstateAbuseEmailAddress
alert.title: Abuse Email Address
alert.message: Setting this to a valid email address will cause abuse reports on this estate to be sent to that address. Setting it blank will cause abuse reports to be sent only to Linden Lab.

alert.name: HelpEstateBanResident
alert.title: Deny Access
alert.message: Residents on this list are denied access to your estate, regardless of any other settings.

alert.name: HelpEstateVoiceChat
alert.title: Allow Voice Chat
alert.message:
Parcels in this estate are allowed to have their own voice channels in which residents may hear and talk with others nearby.
Default: off

alert.name: VoiceVersionMismatch
alert.title: Voice Version Mismatch
alert.message: This version of [SECOND_LIFE] is not compatible with the Voice Chat feature in this region. In order for Voice Chat to function correctly you will need to update [SECOND_LIFE].

alert.name: HelpEstateCovenant
alert.title: Estate Covenant
alert.message:
Setting an estate covenant enables you to sell parcels within that estate. If a covenant is not set, you cannot sell the land. The notecard for your covenant can be empty if you do not wish to apply any rules or advise buyers of anything in relation to the land before they buy it.
A covenant can be used to communicate rules, guidelines, cultural information or simply your own expectations to the prospective buyer. This can include zoning, building regulations, payment options or any other information you feel it is important for the new owner to have seen and to have agreed to before they purchase.
The buyer must agree to the covenant by ticking the check box before they will be able to finish the purchase. Estate covenants are always visible in the About Land dialog for any parcels that have one set.

alert.name: BuyObjectOneOnly
alert.title: Can't Buy Objects
alert.message: Unable to buy more than one object at a time. Please select only one object and try again.

alert.name: BuyObjectOneOwner
alert.title: Can't Buy Objects
alert.message: Cannot buy objects from different owners at the same time. Please select only one object and try again.

alert.name: BuyContentsOneOnly
alert.title: Can't Buy Contents
alert.message: Unable to buy the contents of more than one object at a time. Please select only one object and try again.

alert.name: BuyContentsOneOwner
alert.title: Can't Buy Contents
alert.message: Cannot buy objects from different owners at the same time. Please select only one object and try again.

alert.name: PermYes
alert.message: Yes

alert.name: PermNo
alert.message: No

alert.name: BuyOriginal
alert.message: Buy original object from [OWNER] for L$[PRICE]? You will become the owner of this object. You will be able to: Modify: [MODIFYPERM] Copy: [COPYPERM] Resell or Give Away: [RESELLPERM]

alert.name: BuyOriginalNoOwner
alert.message: Buy original object for L$[PRICE]? You will become the owner of this object. You will be able to: Modify: [MODIFYPERM] Copy: [COPYPERM] Resell or Give Away: [RESELLPERM]

alert.name: BuyCopy
alert.message: Buy a copy from [OWNER] for L$[PRICE]? The object will be copied to your inventory. You will be able to: Modify: [MODIFYPERM] Copy: [COPYPERM] Resell or Give Away: [RESELLPERM]

alert.name: BuyCopyNoOwner
alert.message: Buy a copy for L$[PRICE]? The object will be copied to your inventory. You will be able to: Modify: [MODIFYPERM] Copy: [COPYPERM] Resell or Give Away: [RESELLPERM]

alert.name: BuyContents
alert.message: Buy contents from [OWNER] for L$[PRICE]? They will be copied to your inventory.

alert.name: BuyContentsNoOwner
alert.message: Buy contents for L$[PRICE]? They will be copied to your inventory.

alert.name: ConfirmPurchase
alert.message:
This transaction will: [ACTION]
Are you sure you want to proceed with this purchase?

alert.name: ConfirmPurchasePassword
alert.message:
This transaction will: [ACTION]
Are you sure you want to proceed with this purchase? Please re-enter your password and click OK.

alert.name: SetPickLocation
alert.message: Note: You have updated the location of this pick but the other details will retain their original values.

alert.name: MoveInventoryFromObject
alert.message:
You have selected 'no copy' inventory items. These items will be moved to your inventory, not copied.
Move the inventory item(s)?
alert.ignore: When moving no-copy inventory from objects

alert.name: MoveInventoryFromScriptedObject
alert.message:
You have selected 'no copy' inventory items. These items will be moved to your inventory, not copied. Because this object is scripted, moving these items to your inventory may cause the script to malfunction.
Move the inventory item(s)?
alert.ignore: When moving no-copy inventory from scripted objects

alert.name: ClickActionNotPayable
alert.message: Warning: The Pay Object click action has been set, but it will only work if a script is added with a money() event.
alert.ignore: When Setting 'Pay' on objects without money() events

alert.name: OpenObjectCannotCopy
alert.message: There are no items in this object that you are allowed to copy.

alert.name: WebLaunchAccountHistory
alert.message: Go to the [SECOND_LIFE] web site to see your account history?
alert.ignore: When loading account history web page

alert.name: ClickOpenF1Help
alert.message: Visit the [SECOND_LIFE] Support Web site? (note: this is not an Imprudence Help site)
alert.ignore: When visiting the [SECOND_LIFE] Support Website.

alert.name: RetryFetchInventoryDescendents
alert.message: Inventory fetch from server timed out. Retry?
alert.ignore: Retry Fetch Inventory Descendents

alert.name: ConfirmQuit
alert.message: Are you sure you want to quit?
alert.ignore: When Quitting

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseEmailLL
alert.message:
Use this tool to report violations of the Terms of Service and Community Standards. See:
http://secondlife.com/corporate/tos.php http://secondlife.com/corporate/cs.php
All reported abuses of the Terms of Service and Community Standards are investigated and resolved. You can view the incident resolution on the Incident Report at:
http://secondlife.com/support/incidentreport.php

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseEmailEO
alert.message:
IMPORTANT: This report will go to the owner of the region you are currently in and not to Linden Lab.
As a service to residents and visitors, the owner of the region you are in has elected to receive and resolve all reports originating in this region. Linden Lab will not investigate reports you file from this location.
The region owner will resolve reports based on the local rules of this region as outlined in the estate Covenant. (View covenants by going to the World menu and selecting About Land.)
The resolution of this report applies only to this Region; Residents access to other areas of [SECOND_LIFE] will not be affected by the outcome of this report. Only Linden Lab can restrict access to the entirety of [SECOND_LIFE].

alert.name: HelpReportBug
alert.message:
Use this tool to *only* report technical features that do not perform as described or expected, please provide as much detail as possible, You may reply to the auto-response email to add more details to your report.
All bug reports are investigated and assessed. No email response will be sent.
If you are having a technical difficulty, please contact Support at:
http://secondlife.com/community/support.php
Note: Incomplete reports will not be investigated

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseSelectCategory
alert.message: Please select a category for this abuse report. Selecting a category helps us file and process abuse reports.

alert.name: HelpReportBugSelectCategory
alert.message: Please select a category for this bug. Selecting a category helps us file and process bug reports.

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseAbuserNameEmpty
alert.message: Please enter the name of the abuser. Entering an accurate value helps us file and process abuse reports.

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseAbuserLocationEmpty
alert.message: Please enter the location where the abuse took place. Entering an accurate value helps us file and process abuse reports.

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseSummaryEmpty
alert.message: Please enter a summary of the abuse that took place. Entering an accurate summary helps us file and process abuse reports.

alert.name: HelpReportBugSummaryEmpty
alert.message: Please enter a summary of the bug. Entering an accurate summary helps us file and process bug reports.

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseDetailsEmpty
alert.message: Please enter a detailed description of the abuse that took place. Be as specific as you can, including names and the details of the incident you are reporting. Entering an accurate description helps us file and process abuse reports.

alert.name: HelpReportBugDetailsEmpty
alert.message: Please enter a detailed description of the bug. Be as specific as you can, including steps to reproduce the bug if possible. Entering an accurate description helps us file and process bug reports.

alert.name: HelpReportAbuseContainsCopyright
alert.message:
Dear Resident,
You appear to be reporting intellectual property infringement. Please make sure you are reporting it correctly:
(1) The Abuse Process. You may submit an abuse report if you believe a Resident is exploiting the [SECOND_LIFE] permissions system, for example, by using CopyBot or similar copying tools, to infringe intellectual property rights. The Abuse Team investigates and issues appropriate disciplinary action for behavior that violates the [SECOND_LIFE] Community Standards or Terms of Service. However, the Abuse Team does not handle and will not respond to requests to remove content from the [SECOND_LIFE] world.
(2) The DMCA or Content Removal Process. To request removal of content from [SECOND_LIFE], you MUST submit a valid notification of infringement as provided in our DMCA Policy at http://secondlife.com/corporate/dmca.php.
If you still wish to continue with the abuse process, please close this window and finish submitting your report. You may need to select the specific category 'CopyBot or Permissions Exploit'.
Thank you,
Linden Lab

alert.name: FailedRequirementsCheck
alert.message: The following required components are missing from [FLOATER]: [COMPONENTS]

alert.name: ReplaceAttachment
alert.title: Replace Existing Attachment
alert.message: There is already an object attached to this point on your body. Do you want to replace it with the selected object?
alert.ignore: When replacing existing attachments

alert.name: BusyModePay
alert.title: Busy Mode Warning
alert.message:
You are in Busy Mode, which means you will not receive any items offered in exchange for this payment.
Would you like to leave Busy Mode before completing this transaction?
alert.ignore: When paying a person or object in busy mode

alert.name: ConfirmEmptyTrash
alert.message: Are you sure you want to permanently remove the contents of your Trash folder?
alert.ignore: When emptying your inventory trash folder

alert.name: ConfirmClearBrowserCache
alert.message: Are you sure you want to clear your browser cache?

alert.name: ConfirmClearCookies
alert.message: Are you sure you want to clear your cookies?

alert.name: ConfirmClearMediaUrlList
alert.message: Are you sure you want to clear your list of saved URLs?

alert.name: ConfirmEmptyLostAndFound
alert.message: Are you sure you want to permanently remove the contents of your Lost And Found folder?
alert.ignore: When emptying your inventory Lost And Found folder

alert.name: CopySLURL
alert.message:
The following SLURL has been copied to your clipboard: [SLURL]
Put it in a web page to give others easy access to this location or try it out yourself by pasting it into the address bar of your web browser.
alert.ignore: When copying a SLURL to your clipboard

alert.name: GraphicsPreferencesHelp
alert.message:
This panel controls window size and resolution and the quality of the client's graphics. The Preferences > Graphics interface allows you to choose between four graphics levels: Low, Mid, High, and Ultra. You may also customize your graphics settings by checking the Custom checkbox and manipulating the following settings:
Shaders: Enable or disable various types of pixel shaders.
Reflection Detail: Sets the types of objects that water can reflect.
Avatar Rendering: Sets options that affect how the client renders avatars.
Draw Distance: Affects how far out from your viewpoint objects will be rendered in the scene.
Max Particle Count: Sets the maximum number of particles you are able to see on your screen at once.
Post Process Quality: Sets the resolution with which Glow is rendered.
Mesh Detail: Sets the amount of detail or number of triangles used in rendering certain objects. A higher value takes longer to render, but makes these objects appear with more detail.
Lighting Detail: Selects what types of lights you would like to render.
Terrain Detail: Sets the amount of detail you would like to see for the terrain texture.

alert.name: WLSavePresetAlert
alert.message: Do you wish to overwrite the saved preset?

alert.name: WLDeletePresetAlert
alert.message: Do you wish to delete [SKY]?

alert.name: WLNoEditDefault
alert.message: You cannot edit or delete a default preset.

alert.name: WLMissingSky
alert.message: This day cycle file references a missing sky file: [SKY].

alert.name: PPSaveEffectAlert
alert.message: PostProcess Effect exists. Do you still wish overwrite it?

alert.name: HelpEditSky
alert.message: Edit the WindLight sliders to create and save a set of skies.

alert.name: HelpEditDayCycle
alert.message: Set which skies to turn to throughout the day.

alert.name: EnvSettingsHelpButton
alert.message:
These settings adjust the way the environment looks locally on your computer. Your graphics card needs to support atmospheric shaders in order to have access to all of the settings.
Adjust the "Time of Day" slider to change the day's phase locally on the viewer.
Adjust the "Cloud Cover" slider to control how much the clouds cover the sky.
Pick a color in the "Water Color" color picker to change the color of the water.
Adjust the "Water Fog" slider to control how dense the fog is underwater.
Click "Use Estate Time" to reset the time of day to the region's current time of day and remain linked to it.
Click "Advanced Sky" to bring up an editor with more advanced settings for the sky.
Click "Advanced Water" to bring up an editor with more advanced settings for the water.

alert.name: HelpDayCycle
alert.message:
The Day Cycle Editor gives you control over the sky during [SECOND_LIFE]'s day/night cycle. This is the cycle that is used by the Basic Environment Editor's Time of Day slider.
The Day Cycle Editor works by setting keyframes. These are nodes (represented by the gray blips on the time graph) that have Sky Presets associated with them. As the Time of Day progresses, the WindLight sky "animates" as it interpolates between these keyframes.
The yellow arrow above the timeline represents your current view, based on Time of Day. Click and drag it to see how your day will animate. You may add or delete keyframes by pressing the Add Key and Delete Key buttons to the right of the timeline.
You can set the time position of a keyframe by either dragging it along the timeline, or by setting its value manually in the Key Frame Settings frame. Within the Key Frame Settings frame, you'll be able to associate the keyframe with its respective WindLight preset.
Length of Cycle dictates the overall duration of a "day". Setting this to a low value (for instance, 2 min.) will mean your entire 24-hour timeline will animate in only two real minutes! Once you are satisfied with your timeline and keyframe cycle, use the Play and Stop buttons to preview the results. Remember- you can also move the yellow time-indicator arrow above the timeline to see the cycle animate interactively. Using the Use Estate Time button will synchronize your day length and time of day with the Estate's day cycle.
Once you are pleased with your Day Cycle, you can save and load it with the Save Test Day and Load Test Day buttons. Note that, for now, we only allow one Day Cycle.

alert.name: HelpBlueHorizon
alert.message: Use the Red/Green/Blue (RGB) sliders to adjust the color of the sky. You can use the Intensity (I) slider to move all three RGB sliders in unison.

alert.name: HelpHazeHorizon
alert.message: Haze Horizon is one of the most useful parameters for adjusting overall light exposure in the scene. It is effective for simulating many exposure settings, such as white-outs from the sun and darker, closed-iris settings.

alert.name: HelpBlueDensity
alert.message: Blue Density affects the overall color saturation of the sky and fog. If you move the Intensity (I) slider to the right, colors will become brighter and more vibrant. If you move it all the way to the left, the colors will become duller, eventually fading to black and white. If you want to fine-tune the sky's color balance, you can control individual elements of saturation by using the Red/Green/Blue (RGB) sliders.

alert.name: HelpHazeDensity
alert.message: Haze Density controls the level of dull, gray haze in the atmosphere. It is effective for simulating scenes with high levels of smoke and man-made pollutants. It is also effective for simulating fog and mist.

alert.name: HelpDensityMult
alert.message: The Density Multiplier can be used to affect the overall atmospheric density. At lower settings, it creates a feeling of "thin air", and at higher settings, it creates a very heavy, smoggy effect.

alert.name: HelpDistanceMult
alert.message: Adjusts WindLight's perceived distance. A value of zero effectively turns off WindLight's influence on terrain and objects. Values greater than 1 simulate greater distances for thicker atmospheric effects.

alert.name: HelpMaxAltitude
alert.message: Max Altitude adjusts the altitude calculations WindLight performs when computing its atmospheric lighting. At later times of day, it is useful for adjusting how "deep" the sunset appears.

alert.name: HelpSunlightColor
alert.message: Adjusts the color and intensity of the direct light in the scene.

alert.name: HelpSunAmbient
alert.message: Adjusts the color and intensity of ambient atmospheric light in the scene.

alert.name: HelpSunGlow
alert.message: The Size slider controls the size of the sun. The Focus slider controls how blurred the sun is over the sky.

alert.name: HelpSceneGamma
alert.message: Adjust the screen's distribution of light and dark.

alert.name: HelpStarBrightness
alert.message: Adjusts the brightness of the stars in the sky.

alert.name: HelpTimeOfDay
alert.message: Controls the location of the sun in the sky. Similar to elevation.

alert.name: HelpEastAngle
alert.message: Controls the location of the sun in the sky. Similar to azimuth.

alert.name: HelpCloudColor
alert.message: Edits the color of the clouds. It is generally recommended to keep it whitish, but hey, have fun if you want.

alert.name: HelpCloudDetail
alert.message: Controls the detail image layered on top of the main cloud image. X and Y control its position. D (Density) controls how puffy or fractured the clouds appear.

alert.name: HelpCloudDensity
alert.message: Allows you to control the position of the clouds with the X and Y sliders and how dense they are with the the D slider.

alert.name: HelpCloudCoverage
alert.message: Controls how much the clouds cover the sky.

alert.name: HelpCloudScale
alert.message: Controls the scaling of the cloud image on the sky dome.

alert.name: HelpCloudScrollX
alert.message: Controls the speed of the clouds as they move in the X direction.

alert.name: HelpCloudScrollY
alert.message: Controls the speed of the clouds as they move in the Y direction.

alert.name: HelpClassicClouds
alert.message: Check this box to enable rendering of [SECOND_LIFE]'s older classic clouds in addition to WindLight's clouds.

alert.name: HelpWaterFogColor
alert.message: Chooses the color of the underwater fog.

alert.name: HelpWaterFogDensity
alert.message: Controls how dense the water fog is and how far you can see underwater.

alert.name: HelpUnderWaterFogMod
alert.message: Modifies the effect of the Fog Density Exponent to control how far you can see when your avatar is underwater.

alert.name: HelpWaterGlow
alert.message: Controls how much the surface of the water glows.

alert.name: HelpWaterNormalScale
alert.message: Controls the scaling of the three wavelets that make up the water.

alert.name: HelpWaterFresnelScale
alert.message: Controls how much light is reflected at different angles.

alert.name: HelpWaterFresnelOffset
alert.message: Controls how much light intensity is reflected.

alert.name: HelpWaterScaleAbove
alert.message: Controls how much light is refracted from looking above the surface of the water.

alert.name: HelpWaterScaleBelow
alert.message: Controls how much light is refracted from looking from below the surface of the water.

alert.name: HelpWaterBlurMultiplier
alert.message: Controls how waves and reflections are mixed.

alert.name: HelpWaterNormalMap
alert.message: Controls what normal map is layered across the water to determine reflections/refractions.

alert.name: HelpWaterWave1
alert.message: Controls where and how fast the large scaled version of the normal map moves in the X and Y direction.

alert.name: HelpWaterWave2
alert.message: Controls where and how fast the the small scaled version of the normal map moves in the X and Y direction.

alert.name: NewSkyPreset
alert.message: Give me a name for the new sky.

alert.name: ExistsSkyPresetAlert
alert.message: Preset already exists!

alert.name: NewWaterPreset
alert.message: Give me a name for the new water preset.

alert.name: ExistsWaterPresetAlert
alert.message: Preset already exists!

alert.name: WaterNoEditDefault
alert.message: You cannot edit or delete a default preset.

alert.name: Cannot_Purchase_an_Attachment
alert.message: Items may not be purchased while they are part of an attachment.

alert.name: DebitPermissionDetails
alert.title: About Requests for the Debit Permission
alert.message: Granting this request gives a script ongoing permission to take Linden dollars (L$) from your account. To revoke this permission, the object owner must delete the object or reset the scripts in the object.

alert.name: AutoWearNewClothing
alert.message: Would you like to automatically wear the clothing item you create?
alert.ignore: Automatically wear new clothing

alert.name: BadURL
alert.message:
Imprudence doesn't know how to handle the link: [SLURL] Most links are similar to this:
secondlife:///app/agent/0e346d8b-4433-4d66-a6b0- fd37083abc4c/about
Please check the spelling and try again.

alert.name: NotAgeVerified
alert.message:
You need to be age-verified in order to access this parcel. Would you like to visit the [SECOND_LIFE] website to verify your age?
[_URL]
alert.ignore: Warn about lack of age verification

alert.name: Cannot enter parcel: no payment info on file

This parcel requires that you have payment information on file before you can access it. Would you like to visit the [SECOND_LIFE] website to set this up?
[_URL]
alert.ignore: Warn about lack of payment info

alert.name: MissingString
alert.message: The string [STRING_NAME] is missing from strings.xml
